front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Bridged Local Area Networks, local area networks (LANs), MAC Bridges, metropolitan
area networks, time-sensitive data streams, Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1 Q defines enhancements to the forwarding and queueing functions of a VLAN Bridge to support the transmission of time-sensitive data streams.
